WorkItem.ClosedComment: thanks for reporting, this is fixed.
WorkItem.Description:
# You know that link doesn't actually work, right?

It seems that http://typescriptlang.org/anything redirects to http://www.typescriptlang.org/ and loses the path.

Consider changing the main page to say http://www.typescriptlang.org/playground (or http://www.typescriptlang.org/Playground to match the link on typescriptlang.org)?
